chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
q: pos n
p: pos n

Goal:
p = q -> vec_pos (vec_one p) q = 1

Premises:
vec_pos : forall (X : Type) (n : nat), vec X n -> pos n -> X
vec_one = fun p : pos n => vec_set_pos (fun q : pos n => if pos_eq_dec p q then 1 else 0) : pos n -> vec nat n
Notation pos := Fin.t
vec_change_neq : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p q : pos n) (x : X), p <> q -> vec_pos (vec_change v p x) q = vec_pos v q
vec_change_eq : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p q : pos n) (x : X), p = q -> vec_pos (vec_change v p x) q = x
pos_nxt_inj : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), pos_nxt p = pos_nxt q -> p = q
pos2nat_inj : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), pos2nat p = pos2nat q -> p = q
vec_plus = fun v w : vec nat n => vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => vec_pos v p + vec_pos w p) : vec nat n -> vec nat n -> vec nat n
Fin.eqb_eq : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), Fin.eqb p q = true < -> p = q
vec_pos_ext : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v w : vec X n), (forall p : pos n, vec_pos v p = vec_pos w p) -> v = w
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.eqb_nat_eq : forall (m n : nat) (p : pos m) (q : pos n), Fin.eqb p q = true -> m = n
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p0 q0 : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q0) -> p0 = q0 where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
vec_pos_plus : forall (v w : vec nat n) (p : pos n), vec_pos (vec_plus v w) p = vec_pos v p + vec_pos w p
vec_pos_tail : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X (S n)) (p : pos n), vec_pos (vec_tail v) p = vec_pos v (pos_nxt p)
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : vec ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.hd v ## VectorDef.tl v where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type]
vec_pos_map : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p : pos n), vec_pos (vec_map f v) p = f (vec_pos v p)
Fin.weak : forall p0 : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p0 + ?m) -> pos (p0 + ?n) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q0 : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q0} where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p0 : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p0)) = p0 where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.depair_sanity : forall (o : pos ?m) (p0 : pos ?n), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.depair o p0)) = ?n * proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat o) + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]

```coq
intros H.
unfold vec_one.
unfold vec_pos.
simpl.
destruct (pos_eq_dec p q) as [Hpq | Hnpq].
- rewrite Hpq.
  rewrite vec_change_eq.
  auto.
- rewrite vec_change_neq by assumption.
  auto.
Qed.```

original: intros H. unfold vec_one. unfold vec_pos. simpl. destruct (pos_eq_dec p q) as [Hpq | Hnpq]. - rewrite Hpq. rewrite vec_change_eq. auto. - rewrite vec_change_neq by auto. auto.
